data.title: Miami
data.meta_description: City of Miami website allows residents and visitors to read about key services, important news and other government information.
data.text:
Regularly Schedule Garbage Services for Labor Day

Published on August 28, 2024

The City of Miami Department of Solid Waste will conduct its regularly-scheduled garbage, recycling, and bulky trash services on Monday, September 2, 2024 – Labor Day.

City of Miami Statement

Published on August 27, 2024

On April 12, 2024, Governor DeSantis signed House Bill No. 601, effective July 1, 2024, prohibiting Florida cities from enacting or enforcing ordinances related to handling complaints or civilian oversight of law enforcement misconduct, except as specified.

City of Miami voters said YES to Independent Inspector General Office

Published on August 21, 2024

The residents of our great City overwhelmingly decided that establishing the Office of the Independent Inspector General will ensure that our government operates transparently and efficiently, inspiring confidence in our City’s future.

PUBLIC NOTICE WORKSHOP

Published on August 05, 2024

Two or more Commissioners of the City of Miami, and members of their staff, may be participating in a Workshop to discuss the State of Florida’s appropriations process, including the best types of projects in terms of dollar amount and categories, House/Senate sponsors and more. The Workshop is scheduled for Monday, August 12, 2024, at 12:00 P.M., at Miami City Hall

CANCELLED PUBLIC MEETING BETWEEN THE CITY OF MIAMI & MIAMI-DADE COUNTY

Published on July 26, 2024

Notice is hereby given that the joint public meeting between the City of Miami and Miami-Dade County that was scheduled for Monday, July 29, 2024, has been CANCELLED.

JOINT PUBLIC MEETING BETWEEN THE CITY OF MIAMI & MIAMI-DADE COUNTY

Published on July 24, 2024

Pursuant to Section 164.1055, Florida Statutes (Governmental Disputes), a joint public meeting between the City of Miami and Miami-Dade County will be held on July 29, 2024, at 1:00 P.M., in the auditorium of the City of Miami Chief Clarence Dickson Police College located at 350 N.W. 2nd Avenue, Miami, Florida 33128.

Notice of City Commission Meeting July 25, 2024

Published on July 19, 2024

A regularly scheduled meeting of the Miami City Commission will be held on Thursday, July 25, 2024, at 9:00 a.m. in the City Commission chambers located at Miami City Hall, 3500 Pan American Drive, Miami, FL 33133.
